name: PEPEX
description: What is the project about? PEPEX is a decentralized exchange built on Arbitrum to welcome every memecoin, user can swap, trade, and farm on the protocol easily, and anyone can deposit whitelisted crypto assets (such as ETH, USDC, USDT, WBTC). What makes your project unique? The low gas on the swap and the APR on the farming pools. History of your project. We just launched today, after successfully organically growing the community on twitter. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Deploy on ETH, BSC, and Polygon chain What can your token be used for? User can earn $PEPEX by farming on the pools.
